metadata.title: Intune macOS Configuration Policies
metadata.description: Collection of Microsoft Intune configuration policies for macOS device management

policy.name: Platform SSO
policy.description: Configures Platform Single Sign-On (SSO) for Microsoft Entra ID authentication on macOS devices, enabling seamless authentication across Microsoft services and applications.

policy.name: Passcode Policy (DDM)
policy.description: Enforces passcode requirements for macOS devices including minimum length, complexity, failed attempt limits, and expiration policies to ensure device security compliance.

policy.name: Passcode Policy (DDM) - Template
policy.description: Template passcode policy for macOS devices with DDM (Declarative Device Management) enforcement including minimum length, complexity, and security requirements.

policy.name: Enable FileVault in Setup Assistant
policy.description: Configures FileVault disk encryption on macOS devices during Setup Assistant with recovery key escrow to Microsoft Endpoint Manager for enterprise data protection.
